title: Construction Executive Assistant
description:
We are seeking a high-level Executive Virtual Assistant to directly support our General Manager. For 17 years, our family-owned business has built a reputation for "unparalleled detail" and "perfection" in custom home building. We need an assistant who mirrors these values—someone who operates with precision, anticipates needs, and ensures the GM can focus on delivering award-winning homes.



Hours: 20 hours per week.

Schedule: Monday – Friday, 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Eastern Time.



Apply here: 



Key Responsibilities

Calendar &
 Management: Act as the gatekeeper for the General Manager’s inbox and schedule. Prioritize urgent construction site issues, client meetings, and vendor coordination.

Project Coordination: Track project milestones for ongoing builds. Follow up with subcontractors and suppliers to ensure deliveries and inspections are on schedule.

Client Liaison: Professional communication with homeowners to provide updates or gather necessary documentation during the construction process.

Administrative Excellence: Prepare daily briefings, organize digital files, and assist in drafting contracts or change orders with meticulous attention to detail.

Operations Support: Researching vendors and comparing material quotes



Apply here: 





Qualifications

Experience: At least 3–5 years of experience as an Executive Assistant or Operations VA. Experience in real estate, construction, or luxury services is highly preferred.

Communication: Exceptional verbal and written English. You must be able to represent the General Manager and the company professionally.

Detail-Oriented: A natural obsession with "getting it right the first time." You should be the person who catches the small errors others miss.

Tech Savvy: Proficiency in CRM tools (e.g., BuilderTrend, CoConstruct, or similar), Google Workspace, and project management software.



Apply here:

title: CRM Coordinator
description:
We are seeking a CRM Assistant / Coordinator to support the execution and quality control of
 and SMS marketing campaigns. This role focuses on campaign and trigger builds, asset management, list segmentation, scheduling, and QA. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, process-driven, and experienced in executing lifecycle marketing workflows that support engagement and revenue goals. 



Responsibilities:



Build, schedule, and QA all
 and SMS campaigns

Support trigger and lifecycle builds, with the opportunity to expand into flow creation over time

Manage signup unit execution and ongoing optimization

Create, maintain, and quality-check audience segments and suppression lists

Own campaign QA including link validation, UTM tagging, and rendering checks

Monitor deliverability best practices and flag potential issues

Maintain organized campaign assets and documentation

Ensure accurate execution across timelines and deployment schedules



Requirements:



1–2 years of experience in CRM, lifecycle marketing, or
/SMS coordination

Hands-on experience supporting campaign builds and scheduling

Strong understanding of list management, segmentation, and QA processes

High attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously

Familiarity with CRM or ESP platforms; experience with Klaviyo is a strong plus

title: Appointment Setter
description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a dedicated and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to manage inspections and tenant communications for our rental properties. The ideal candidate will be highly organized, customer-service oriented, and able to handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:

• Respond to tenant inquiries via text,
, and phone calls.

• Assist tenants with any issues or questions related to their requests

• Verify completion of all cleaning jobs after check-out and ensure properties meet company standards.

• Communicate with teams and property managers to resolve any discrepancies.

• Document and file information for property damage or tenant-related issues.

• Assist with general administrative tasks as needed.

Qualifications:

• Previous experience in customer service or virtual assistant roles

• Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

• Ability to handle guest concerns professionally and efficiently.

• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

title: Website Sales Lead Generation Rep
description:
Are you tired of campaign-based work that ends every few months or maybe after 1 year?

•Would you like to work at a company with advancement opportunities where you can spend your whole career?

•Do you want to work at a supportive company with a friendly, family culture?

•Do you want to be able to work overtime (but not have it required)?

•Do you want to work for a company where Filipinos are not considered to be outsiders?

•Do you want to work somewhere with no danger they ever ask you to work in person?



Then this is your opportunity.



We build beautiful websites for small businesses across the United States and Canada. Our amazing team of 110 associates has produced incredible results:



We have grown 30%+ each year for the last 8 years.



We have over 2,000 5-star reviews.



100% of our managers and team leads started in entry-level positions with our company.



APPLY HERE: Upgrade to see actual info/f9aaPs/kd86oiarhx/index



Job Description:

You will make outbound calls to small business owners using a dialing platform.

You will offer our website services to potential clients.

You may answer inbound calls from potential clients, scheduling them for appointments to speak to a web designer.



What we offer:

Base pay Php 6,350 per week plus night differential (=Php 7,000/wk.)

Weekly incentive pay

Monthly attendance bonus

Monthly technology allowance

Pay is received every Friday

Very stable work

Permanent position (not just a contract)

Overtime is always available (but not required)

Ability to work from home

Respectful, encouraging work culture

Opportunity to grow with the company



APPLY HERE: Upgrade to see actual info/f9aaPs/kd86oiarhx/index



We are looking for friendly, professional people with strong English language skills to join our team. We are looking for:

Excellent English language skills, both verbal and written

Experience with appointment setting OR equivalent outbound calling experience

Ability to work from home (Must have good internet access, a computer, and a headset.)

A history of great teamwork

Strong customer-handling skills

Able to work during USA business hours from 7:45 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time with overtime (7:45 p.m. to 4 a.m. Manila Time) Monday through Friday, along with an optional OT that runs through 5:00 a.m. Eastern Standard Time.



This is a permanent work-from-home position. Our workflow is extremely stable.



We are a Christian-led business. You will hear a lot about our faith when you work here. We have adopted 8 orphanages in the Philippines with 164 orphans. None of these kids has a birthday that someone on our staff isn't there to celebrate. We reimburse Financial Peace classes, and some employees meet for a Bible study on the clock. You won't have to participate in any of this, but you can. You don't have to be a Christian to work here.

title: Real Estate VA - Inside Sales Agent
description:
Real Estate Virtual Assistant - Full-Time Inside Sales Agent

(Must have prior real estate experience)



Our St. Louis, MO, USA-based Real Estate Investments company, with over a decade in real estate investing, is seeking a dedicated and experienced real estate professional to join our growing team! If you enjoy negotiating deals, have a proven track record in real estate sales, and are looking for a remote opportunity where you can make an impact, please read the details and apply below by reading the how to apply instructions.



Job Description:

We are hiring for the position of Real Estate Inside Sales Agent. In this role, you will work remotely and be responsible for speaking with homeowners, gathering property information, negotiating offers, and securing contracts for our investment properties. Your main focus will be on acquiring distressed properties at favorable terms by getting property info, making offers, negotiating deals, and diligently following up to close sales. You will use your sales expertise and relationship-building skills to engage potential sellers, gather necessary information, and document interactions in our CRM system.



Responsibilities:

- Conduct outbound calls and send
s to manage real estate buying opportunities.

- Make offers to potential sellers and negotiate terms to get our offers accepted.

- Follow up on all leads and negotiations to ensure deal closure.

- Utilize effective sales strategies and scripts to handle objections and convey our company’s value proposition.

- Maintain detailed records of all interactions and negotiations in our CRM system.

- Collaborate with other tea
mbers to ensure seamless transaction processes.



Qualifications:

- High Energy and Enthusiastic Personality: You thrive in a fast-paced, engaging environment.

- 2+ Years of Real Estate Sales and Negotiations Experience: Proven background in closing deals.

- Exceptional English Communication Skills: Fluent in both written and verbal English.

- Fearless Negotiator: Eager to engage in challenging conversations, overcome objections, and secure agreements.

- Organized and Detail-Oriented: Excellent time management skills.

- Technologically Proficient: Experience using CRM systems and quick to learn new technologies.

- Problem Solver: Ability to navigate complex negotiations effectively.



System Requirements:

- Reliable high-speed laptop or desktop computer.

- DSL Internet connection with a minimum speed of 40+ Mbps.

- Noise-canceling headset.

- Must have a dedicated quiet home office setup



Performance Metrics:

- Talk to a certain number of sellers daily, weekly, and monthly.

- Achieve a target number of accepted offers each month.

- Consistently follow up to close deals within expected timeframes.



Career Growth & Training:

- Opportunities for advancement into leadership roles for high-performing individuals.

- Professional training provided to enhance your skills.



Company Culture:

- Dynamic and Collaborative: We value teamwork, integrity, and a drive for excellence.

- Supportive Environment: We believe in ongoing professional growth and celebrating achievements.

- High Ethical Standards: We conduct business with honesty and transparency.



What We’re Looking For:

- Self-motivated professionals with a positive attitude.

- Candidates with a dedicated home office setup.

- Ability to thrive in a remote role with excellent time management skills.

- Experience in real estate sales



What We’re Not Looking For:

- Candidates who cannot commit to our specified working hours: Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM CST.

- Minimal Communication Skills: If you struggle with fluent English communication, both written and verbal.

- Lack of Self-Motivation and Enthusiasm.

- Candidates unfamiliar with CRMs and resistant to learning new systems or scripts.

- Candidates with inconsistent internet and power supply or a disruptive workspace.

- Candidates who are easily flustered, shy, or fearful when making calls.

- Offline or Non-Voice Preference: This is a phone-based sales position.



Pay Rate:

Starting up to $6/hr, with performance bonuses. Pay is issued on the 1st and 15th of each month (CST).



Working Hours:

Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM CST. A 30-minute lunch break and two 15-minute breaks per shift.



How to Apply: (Submit Your Resume and Introduction)

-
 your updated resume and a brief personalized audio or video recording to: 

- Use the subject line "Real Estate Application - Inside Sales Agent"

- In your recording, introduce yourself and explain why you are a great fit for this role.

- Attach a recent internet speed test result and a photo of your home office setup to verify your system readiness.



= Important Note: Only complete applications that follow all the instructions will be considered. We look forward to reviewing your application! =

Thomas

title: Sr. Customer Service Representative for INTL E-commerce
description:
We operate three established and profitable e-commerce stores and are currently launching our fourth. As we continue to scale, we’re looking for a highly experienced Senior Customer Service Representative who can manage phone,
, and chat support for multiple stores simultaneously.



This is a senior-level role with long-term potential for the right candidate. PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.



Responsibilities -

• Manage customer inquiries via phone,
, and chat across all our stores with clear, accurate, and professional communication.

• Handle RFQs, returns/exchanges, complaints, disputes, and negative reviews in a timely and organized manner.

• Collect positive customer reviews and help maintain strong customer satisfaction across all stores.

• Support sales-related tasks and assist in improving overall store performance and revenue.

• Work closely with the Orders and Product teams to share insights and ensure a consistent customer experience.

• Spot process gaps, suggest improvements, and assist in updating SOPs as needed.

• Complete daily administrative work, including reports, logs, and operational updates.

• Manage assigned tasks proactively and independently, without needing follow-ups or reminders.



What You Need to Succeed -



Required Experience:

• 2+ years in E-commerce Operations (ideally covering customer service, order management, and basic product management).

• Hands-on Shopify experience (day-to-day store operations)

• Strong phone communication skills and ability to handle challenging conversations calmly.

• Comfortable managing multiple priorities in a fast-moving environment.

• Strong attention to detail (include the word mushroom in your application).



Technical Requirements:

• Proficiency in Shopify, ClickUp, Airtable, CRM tools, and Google Workspace.

• A reliable computer + 20 Mbps or faster internet connection.

• Backup solutions for both power and internet solutions to avoid downtime.



Work Style:

• Self-directed - you take initiative, own your tasks, and solve problems independently.

• Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy.

• Customer-focused - complaints are opportunities to improve systems.

• Process-minded - you document and refine workflows naturally.



Work Schedule:

• Full-time, 40 hours/week

• US business hours: 9 PM–6 AM or 10 PM–7 AM PHT

• 1-hour break

• Five days per week



This Role Won't Be a Match If:

• You need micromanagement or detailed daily task lists

• You cannot work 9 PM–7 AM PHT consistently

• You experience frequent power/internet outages without backup solutions

• You view this as temporary income between other opportunities



Before You Apply - Please Confirm:

• Weekly payments for the first 4 weeks (starting from week 3), then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.

• Full-time role, US hours.

• Must be open to a two-month trial period.

• Daily End of Shift (EOS) report answering:

   a) What did you do today? (detailed description)

   b) What issues did you run into?

   c) Anything you need help with?

If you agree to all terms, write “I AGREE TO ALL TERMS” and answer the questions below.



Application Instructions (Follow Exactly) -



Subject Line:

[Your First Name] – I Am Your New Sr. Customer Service Representative

Example: Kevin – I Am Your New Sr. Customer Service Representative



Submit:

• Cover letter (focused on relevant e-commerce experience)

• Resume



Answer These Questions (Complete Sentences Required):

1. Describe your most relevant e-commerce operations experience (platforms used, team size, order volume, responsibilities).

2. What specific Shopify tasks have you performed?

3. What are your current work commitments and availability?

4. Provide your internet speed (include screenshot), computer specifications, and backup solutions for power & internet issues.

5. Provide one example of a difficult customer situation you handled and how you resolved it.

6. Why are you interested in this specific role instead of other VA positions?



Important: AI-generated or template responses will be immediately disqualified. We're looking for thoughtful, specific answers that demonstrate you read and understood this posting.

dia

dia

dia is the leading B2B floral media and industry-matching platform dedicated to innovation, collaboration, and elevating the global floral community.

dia’s trusted brand.

, YouTube, and Threads using Metricool.

 Marketing & Audience Growth

 lists (ZeroBounce) and upload campaigns to MailerLite or Instantly.ai.

title: Graphic Designer & Video Editor
description:
About Us:

New Bloom Solutions is a rapidly growing startup specializing in helping B2B businesses in the floral industry connect with essential services—such as website design, marketing, communication, and networking. Our mission is to bring innovation to the floral sector and help our clients thrive. As we expand, we’re looking for passionate, creative professionals to join our team.



Position Overview:

We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer & Video Editor who can deliver high-quality visual content and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment. The ideal candidate must be proficient in graphic design and video editing tools, have some familiarity with social media management and analytics, and excel at communication. We value individuals who take initiative, offer new ideas, and have experience working in fast-moving, deadline-driven settings—ideally with previous agency experience.



Key Responsibilities:



Create compelling graphics and visual assets for digital and print platforms (social media posts, website banners, marketing materials).

Edit and produce engaging video content for promotions, educational materials, and social media campaigns.

Collaborate with the marketing and communications team to develop creative concepts that align with brand guidelines and business objectives.

Manage projects in Asana to ensure organized workflows and on-time delivery.

Review social media analytics and performance metrics to improve content strategies.

Communicate effectively with tea
mbers and clients, providing timely updates and clarifications.

Contribute innovative ideas to support company growth and enhance brand presence.

Required Skills & Qualifications:



Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro) and Canva.

Some familiarity with social media management and analytics tools.

Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken.

Strong attention to detail, problem-solving abilities, and adept at meeting deadlines.

Able to work effectively in a fast-paced environment (at least 4 years of experience in a similar setting).

Previous experience in a marketing agency is strongly preferred.

Team player willing to share ideas and collaborate.

Preferred Qualifications:



Basic knowledge of the floral industry is not required.

Experience in roles that involved rapid project turnover and adapting quickly to shifting priorities.

What We Offer:



Competitive pay

Vacation time after 6 months of employment

Performance-based bonuses

Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement within a supportive, innovative team environment

If you’re excited to thrive in a dynamic setting, contribute to a growing company, and elevate the floral industry through innovative marketing solutions, we’d love to hear from you. Please reach out via chat if you have any questions or wish to apply.

title: Bookkeeper
description:

As well as getting to be a tea
mber in a leading innovative accountancy practice you will also get



Competitive Salary (PHP45,000 per month)

40-hour working week

Extra annual leave over Christmas/New Year

2 weeks off over the festive period

13th-month pay scheme

Clear steps for growth in your role and salary

Regular fun (sometimes competitive) team get-togethers (online escape rooms, quizzes, etc)

Quarterly scheduled input on company direction

Full training and support

Philhealth and possibly full health cover



Here are some thoughts and comments from the team



I love the quarterly reviews as it gets everyone involved and all opinions are listened to – Lauren (Senior Bookkeeper)

Everyone cares and is really helpful so you are never worried about asking questions – Regina (Administrator)

We have an ability to have a say on our and the company’s future, it’s not just a job it’s about our personal life too – Georgia (Client Manager)

I enjoy the work culture and environment as there is a right mix of professionalism and fun – Gerald (Accountant)



About the role

Well, you’ll need to be highly organised with a keen eye for detail. Your day-to-day tasks will consist of admin duties and some bookkeeping.



As an overview, your tasks will involve –



Entering data into our CRM & technical systems

Updating data in our CRM & technical systems

Managing
s

Chasing clients, suppliers and other accountants for information

Chasing tea
mbers for information to deadlines

Processing invoices and receipts

Processing sales invoices

Reconciling bank accounts

HMRC registrations and authorisations

Confirmation statement preparation and filing

Running payroll

Creating, amending and updating processes

Plus more



We are not expecting someone to join our team with the full range of skills. We are a highly systemised and process-driven company with lots of tools to help you learn. Currently a Filipino VA covers this role and will assist with teaching areas of development. A can-do attitude and organisation skills are essential.



About MBS Accountants

At MBS we do more than just accounting – we help business owners take control of their numbers, grow their profits, and build the lifestyle and freedom they want. Our approach combines smart technology, clear strategies, and straight-talking coaching to make a real difference for our clients.



We’re also building something exciting ourselves. MBS is a fast-growing, forward-thinking firm that’s reshaping what accounting can look like in the modern world. We use AI and the latest systems to keep ahead, and we’re on an ambitious path of growth through innovation and acquisitions.



For our team, this means being part of a company where:

• Everyone knows the bigger picture and where we’re headed.

• There’s space to grow your skills and take on new challenges.

• We combine professionalism with a fun, relaxed working environment.

• Work-life balance is valued and supported.



Joining MBS Accountants

At MBS Accountants we are fuelled by helping business owners to stop surviving and start thriving. We are also focused on the quality of life of our team and we support a healthy work-life balance.



We are looking for people who fit our values



Do what you say – Nobody likes being let down and we think it’s key you don’t set unrealistic expectations. Seek to understand the importance of the task and any deadlines and agree realistic timescales and stick to them or communicate early regarding challenges.



Open and honest – Being a closed book doesn’t help anyone. We don’t believe work and home are two different lives. Life is just life. By being open and honest about your whole life we can be empathetic to your circumstances and together we can work towards growth and positivity.



Take responsibility – Work-life balance is key and fundamental we believe to living a healthy life. We have core hours but each role also has key outcomes and responsibilities. There will be occasions where flexibility may be needed in order to achieve those outcomes and responsibilities and taking responsibility to act accordingly is key.



Team player – As a team we support and empower each other. There will be occasions where you will need to go outside of the standard scope of your role to help out a colleague. This shouldn’t be because we expect it but because you think it’s the right thing to do.



Respect – Respect is everything. It should be a given. It should not come just because of somebodies position but simply because we are all human beings. Being able to be candid with someone about their weaknesses and mistakes when done with love is an absolute sign of respect.





Is this role right for you?



If you can answer yes to all the below then this role is perfect for you!



Do you love being organised?

Do you have a can-do attitude?

Do you like data to be stored accurately?

Do you like things to be easy to find?

Do you question things that don't seem right?

Do you ask questions to understand how you can make a greater impact?

Do you enjoy challenges and recognise when to ask for help and when to keep pushing on?

Are you keen to practice regular self-improvement/personal development?

Do you like being recognised for all the hard work you put in?





Want to work with us?



If this sounds like your dream job then we’d love for you to join our team.

1 - Apply here on onlinejobs.ph

2 - Send a video to 

The video should

A - Make sure we know which applicant you are and can match you up

B - Answer the following questions (give us an idea of you as a person)

i) A quick introduction name, age, where you live

ii) Tell us about what you like doing in your spare time (hobbies, interests, etc)?

iii) Who is in your family?

iv) Which is your favourite of our values and why?

v) Why you would love to work for us?

vi) What is the best thing you can bring to us?

title: Data Entry/ Data Processing Specialist (Job Ref: STRT-DE-38801)
description:
Company Overview



StrataWorks is a leading provider of digital consulting and operational solutions. We assist businesses in optimizing workflows, managing data, and improving operational efficiency. Our clients range from startups to established enterprises, and our team is dedicated to delivering accurate, timely, and high-quality operational support.



Position Summary



StrataWorks is seeking a Data Entry / Data Processing Specialist to support the management and maintenance of information across internal systems. This position is critical for ensuring the accuracy, organization, and reliability of data used in decision-making and operational processes.



This is a support role focused on precision and consistency. Technical expertise beyond basic data handling is not required.



Key Responsibilities



Enter, update, and organize data in spreadsheets, databases, and internal platforms



Verify data accuracy and completeness



Conduct online research to gather relevant information for projects



Prepare basic reports and maintain documentation



Maintain organized records of client projects, campaigns, or operational tasks



Follow instructions accurately and review work for errors



Provide assistance to tea
mbers as needed



Adapt to changing tasks based on business requirements



Qualifications



Strong attention to detail and commitment to accuracy



Proficiency in spreadsheets and online platforms



Ability to follow instructions consistently



Proactive in seeking clarification when needed



Reliable, accountable, and responsive



Fluent in written English



Willingness to work night shifts aligned with US teams



Preferred but not required:



Previous experience in data entry or data processing



Proficiency with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive)



Familiarity with databases or CRM platforms



Basic online research skills



Experience in remote team environments



C2-level English proficiency



Importance of the Role



Accurate data is essential to the operational success of StrataWorks. By ensuring information is complete, organized, and reliable, the Data Entry / Data Processing Specialist enables the team to make informed decisions, track progress effectively, and execute projects efficiently.



This role is ideal for candidates who are meticulous, dependable, and committed to supporting operational excellence.



How to Apply



Interested candidates are requested to send a message and complete the application form using the following link:

https://forms.gle/xUL7j2faqad5PUc58



Please ensure that all required fields in the form are completed accurately. Only candidates who submit the form and message will be considered for the role.

title: Web Client Scheduling Representative
description:
Are you tired of campaign-based work that ends every few months or maybe after 1 year?

•Would you like to work at a company with advancement opportunities where you can spend your whole career?

•Do you want to work at a supportive company with a friendly, family culture?

•Do you want to be able to work overtime (but not have it required)?

•Do you want to work for a company where Filipinos are not considered to be outsiders?

•Do you want to work somewhere with no danger they ever ask you to work in person?



Then this is your opportunity.



We build beautiful websites for small businesses across the United States and Canada. Our amazing team of 110 associates has produced incredible results:



We have grown 30%+ each year for the last 8 years.



We have over 2,000 5-star reviews.



100% of our managers and team leads started in entry-level positions with our company.



APPLY HERE: Upgrade to see actual info/f9aaPs/kd86oiarhx/index



Job Description:

You will make outbound calls to small business owners using a dialing platform.

You will offer our website services to potential clients.

You may answer inbound calls from potential clients, scheduling them for appointments to speak to a web designer.



What we offer:

Base pay Php 6,350 per week plus night differential (=Php 7,000/wk.)

Weekly incentive pay

Monthly attendance bonus

Monthly technology allowance

Pay is received every Friday

Very stable work

Permanent position (not just a contract)

Overtime is always available (but not required)

Ability to work from home

Respectful, encouraging work culture

Opportunity to grow with the company



APPLY HERE: Upgrade to see actual info/f9aaPs/kd86oiarhx/index



We are looking for friendly, professional people with strong English language skills to join our team. We are looking for:

Excellent English language skills, both verbal and written

Experience with appointment setting OR equivalent outbound calling experience

Ability to work from home (Must have good internet access, a computer, and a headset.)

A history of great teamwork

Strong customer-handling skills

Able to work during USA business hours from 7:45 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time with overtime (7:45 p.m. to 4 a.m. Manila Time) Monday through Friday, along with an optional OT that runs through 5:00 a.m. Eastern Standard Time.



This is a permanent work-from-home position. Our workflow is extremely stable.



We are a Christian-led business. You will hear a lot about our faith when you work here. We have adopted 8 orphanages in the Philippines with 164 orphans. None of these kids has a birthday that someone on our staff isn't there to celebrate. We reimburse Financial Peace classes, and some employees meet for a Bible study on the clock. You won't have to participate in any of this, but you can. You don't have to be a Christian to work here.

title: Junior Virtual Assistant for Amazon Account Management
description:
We are hiring a Junior Virtual Assistant to support Amazon account execution across multiple brands on both Amazon Vendor Central (1P) and Seller Central (3P).



This role is focused on accurate, on-time execution of operational tasks. You will work under a VA Manager who provides priorities, instructions, and guidance. Your responsibility is to complete assigned work consistently and keep tasks moving forward in Asana.



This role is well suited for someone early in their Amazon VA career who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable working within structured processes.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



• Support day-to-day operations in Amazon Vendor Central (1P), including PO tracking, catalog updates, and chargeback support

• Support Amazon Seller Central (3P) operations, including FBA shipment tracking, basic inventory checks, stranded inventory monitoring, and account health reviews

• Monitor assigned metrics such as Net PPM, Glance Views, Sales, and Inventory, and flag issues as instructed

• Track shipments, reconcile POs, and assist with Aged Inventory and Shortage Claims

• Review product listings to identify content gaps in titles, bullets, images, and A+ content

• Update trackers, reports, and dashboards as directed

• Execute tasks assigned in Asana and provide timely status updates

• Communicate questions, blockers, and completions in Slack

• Support ad-hoc Amazon operations and account maintenance tasks as assigned



REQUIREMENTS



• Experience with Amazon Vendor Central (1P) and/or Seller Central (3P)

• Familiarity with Amazon operational concepts such as POs, inventory, chargebacks, and listings

• Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets

• Strong attention to detail and task accuracy

• Clear written communication in English

• Comfortable working full time on Philippines hours

• Reliable internet connection and ability to meet deadlines



PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



• Previous experience as an Amazon Virtual Assistant

• Exposure to tools such as Looker, Helium 10, or similar reporting platforms

• Experience working with task management and communication tools such as Asana and Slack



HOW YOU WILL BE MEASURED



• Accuracy and timeliness of task completion

• Consistency in Asana updates

• Ability to follow instructions and processes

• Reduction in rework and clarification over time

• Responsiveness to feedback and guidance



TO APPLY



Please submit:



Your resume



A short cover letter describing your Amazon 1P and/or 3P experience



Confirmation that you can work full time on Philippines hours



Confirmation that the monthly compensation of $475 USD works for you



If you want next, I can:

title: Executive Assistant to Managing Partners
description:
We are hiring a high-impact Executive Assistant to support two Managing Partners in a fast-moving operating environment. This role is designed for someone who enjoys creating structure, maintaining 
ntum, and ensuring that priorities move forward smoothly.



You will work closely with leadership to manage communication, scheduling, task flow, and follow-ups, helping the organization operate efficiently and proactively.



Ensure that leadership priorities are organized, actioned, and followed through, so the Managing Partners can stay focused on strategic work.



You will help turn conversations and ideas into clear actions, keep work moving, and make sure nothing important gets missed.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Communication and Inbox Management

• Organize and prioritize
 communications

• Draft responses and flag items requiring decisions

• Track follow-ups and ensure timely closure



Calendar and Time Management

• Schedule meetings and manage calendars

• Identify conflicts and optimize schedules

• Prepare leaders for upcoming meetings



Slack and Task Coordination

• Monitor key Slack channels and leadership mentions

• Translate conversations into actionable Asana tasks

• Ensure tasks have clear owners, deadlines, and next steps



Asana Ownership

• Maintain executive-level boards as the system of record

• Track progress and follow up on open items

• Surface risks or delays early



Meeting Support

• Prepare agendas in advance

• Capture notes, decisions, and action items

• Coordinate post-meeting follow-ups



Presentation and Administrative Support

• Coordinate presentation materials and ensure readiness

• Perform light PowerPoint or Google Slides formatting

• Track key deadlines, contracts, and invoices



HOW YOU WILL OPERATE



• Work proactively and anticipate needs

• Propose next steps when items stall

• Communicate clearly and consistently

• Keep systems organized and up to date

• Escalate decisions and risks with context



REQUIREMENTS



• 3+ years experience supporting executives or senior leaders

• Strong written communication and organizational skills

• High attention to detail and follow-through

• Comfort working in Slack, Asana, and Google Workspace

• Ability to manage multiple priorities effectively

• Reliable availability during EST or PST business hours



PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



• Experience supporting founders or managing partners

• Background in fast-paced or operational environments

• Comfort working cross-functionally



HOW SUCCESS IS MEASURED



• Leadership time is protected and priorities move forward

• Tasks close on time with clear ownership

• Meetings are well prepared and followed up

• Communication loops are consistently closed

• Work progresses without repeated reminders



TO APPLY



Please submit:



Your resume



A short cover letter describing your executive support experience



Confirmation of availability during EST/PST hours



Your earliest possible start date

title: Virtual Assistant for UK Home Services Agency (Full-Time Remote)
description:
Position: Virtual Assistant (Operations & Contractor Coordination)

Location: Remote — preferably Philippines

Hours: Full-time, UK business hours (9 AM – 5 PM UK time)

Pay: Competitive (depending on experience) + long-term growth opportunities



About Us



We’re a fast-growing UK home services company that connects trusted contractors with customers for safety installations, home improvements, and maintenance projects.

We’re building a streamlined system that handles leads, bookings, and contractor management through 
 CRM.



We’re looking for a reliable, proactive Virtual Assistant to join our team long-term — someone who takes ownership, communicates clearly, and can manage multiple moving parts with accuracy.



Key Responsibilities



You’ll be responsible for managing the workflow between new customer enquiries, contractors, and job tracking inside our CRM.



Your daily duties will include:

.

 and inviting local tradespeople.

Sending the Contractor Agreement Form (via

Scheduling jobs and updating the customer’s record with confirmed booking date/time.



Sending confirmation
s to both the customer and contractor.



Following up after visits to collect the contractor’s quote and mark the status as “Quote Ready.”



Assisting with admin tasks like updating contact lists, following up
s, and keeping data accurate.



What Success Looks Like



? All customer enquiries are actioned within 30 minutes.

? Each job has at least 3 contractor invitations on the contractor platforms.

? CRM boards are always up-to-date with correct status and contact info.

? Contractors are onboarded quickly and professionally.





Skills & Requirements



Excellent English (spoken and written)



Comfortable making UK phone calls (we’ll provide a UK virtual number)



Strong experience using CRM platforms (preferably 
, Trello, or ClickUp)



Familiarity with 
, Checkatrade, or similar sites preferred

Tools You’ll Use

Google Sheets / Docs



How to Apply



Please include the following in your application:

Your experience with 
 or other CRM systems.



Your availability in UK time and expected hourly rate.

title: Property Management Virtual Assistant (AppFolio)
description:
We are looking for a highly organized and proactive Virtual Assistant with experience in property management and proficiency in AppFolio. In this role, you will support the daily operations of our property management business by handling administrative tasks, tenant communication, AppFolio data entry, and general coordination. This position is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and understands the nuances of real estate and rental management.



Key Responsibilities:

-Use AppFolio to manage tenant records, work orders, leasing tasks, and financial data.

-Respond to tenant inquiries via phone,
, or AppFolio messaging platform.

-Assist with application processing, lease preparation, and renewals.

-Coordinate maintenance requests and communicate with vendors.

-Manage rent collections and follow up on delinquencies using AppFolio.

-Prepare reports on occupancy, rent roll, and property performance.

-Organize and maintain digital files and property documents.

-Support property managers with scheduling, calendar management, and
 follow-ups.

-Conduct market research and assist with rental listings or marketing tasks, if needed.



Qualifications:

-2+ year of experience in property management support or real estate operations.

-Hands-on experience with AppFolio Property Management Software (required).

-Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

-Highly organized and detail-oriented.

-Strong time management and problem-solving skills.

-Proficient in Google Workspace or Microsoft Office (Docs, Sheets, Excel).

-Ability to work independently in a remote setting with minimal supervision.



Preferred Qualifications:

-Familiarity with leasing procedures, tenant screening, and Fair Housing practices.

-Experience working with U.S.-based property management companies.



How to Apply:

Please send your resume and a short cover letter highlighting your property management and AppFolio experience

title: Property Management Bookkeeper (AppFolio Experience Required)
description:
We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Bookkeeper with experience in AppFolio and a strong background in property management accounting. The ideal candidate will be responsible for organizing financial records, tracking income and expenses, preparing reports, assisting with invoicing, and ensuring compliance with tax documentation requirements such as 1099s. This role is key to maintaining accurate financials and supporting the operational efficiency of our property portfolio.



Key Responsibilities:

-Manage daily financial transactions using AppFolio.

-Record and reconcile income and expense activities across multiple properties.

-Generate financial reports, including monthly income statements and cash flow summaries.

-Assist in issuing invoices to tenants, vendors, or clients.

-Track vendor payments and tenant receipts accurately.

-Handle 1099 filings and ensure proper documentation for tax season.

-Maintain well-organized digital records of all financial data.

-Collaborate with property managers to support budgeting and financial planning.

-Identify discrepancies, resolve billing issues, and ensure timely follow-up on outstanding items.



Preferred Qualifications:

-Experience managing books for multi-family or single-family property portfolios.

-Familiarity with U.S. property tax rules, vendor compliance, and audit preparation.

-Knowledge of QuickBooks



How to Apply:

Submit your resume and a brief cover letter explaining your experience with AppFolio and property management bookkeeping.



We are looking for long-term cooperative relationships!

title: AI-First DTC Video Editor – Performance Ads (Remote)
description:
We're a premium skincare brand helping women 50+ see real results. We're looking for an AI-First DTC Video Editor to create high-performing video ads under our Creative Strategist.



What you'll create:

- VSLs (30s-5min video sales letters)

- AI Avatar Ads (HeyGen, Synthesia, D-ID)

- UGC-style ads (real or AI-generated)

- AI voiceover ads with dynamic B-roll

- Hook variations and caption-only videos

- 20+ ad variations per week



AI tools you must know:

- ElevenLabs (voice cloning)

- HeyGen, Synthesia, D-ID (AI avatars)

- Mirage, Runway, Kling (AI video generation)

- Sync Labs / LipDub (lip sync)

- Topaz Video AI (upscaling)



You must understand:

- Retention editing and pattern interrupts

- VSL structure (Hook - Problem - Agitate - Solution - Proof - CTA)

- Editing for 50+ audiences - engaging but not overwhelming



Requirements:

- 1+ year editing performance ads for DTC/e-commerce

- Expert-level AI video tools

- Fast turnaround, same-day revisions when needed

- Own equipment, reliable internet



Bonus: Beauty/skincare experience, After Effects, 40+ audience experience



This is a long-term role. We invest in our team with training, mentorship, and paid AI tool subscriptions. Flexible hours - we care about output, not when you're online.



To apply, include:

1. Brief intro - who are you, why this role?

2. Portfolio - show us DTC ads that performed

3. Your AI workflow - which tools, how do you use them?



We use AI tools daily - we know what AI-generated applications look like. Write in your own voice.

title: Creative Strategist – Meta Ads (Remote)
description:
About us

We are a premium skincare brand helping women 50+ finally see real, visible results in their skin.



Our customers aren't naive first-time buyers. They're smart, skeptical women who have tried dozens of creams, serums, and devices that promised everything and delivered nothing. They've been disappointed so many times that they've almost stopped believing skincare can work for them.



Our mission is to change that.



We sell in the Netherlands and Belgium – a professional-grade device that actually delivers ingredients into the skin instead of just sitting on top of it. But here's the thing: the product works. The challenge is getting women who've been burned before to believe it.

That's where you come in.



The Role

We're looking for a Creative Strategist who can get inside the minds of our customers – not just understand them intellectually, but feel what they feel.



These women look in the mirror and think: "I feel so much younger than I look."



They're not vain. They're not chasing 25 again. They just want their outside to match how vibrant they feel inside. And they're tired of being sold empty promises by brands that don't understand them.



Your job is to create ad concepts that make them stop scrolling and think: "Finally, someone gets it."



This isn't about flashy editing or viral trends. It's about genuine connection. Our best-performing ads feel like advice from a trusted friend, not marketing from a corporation.



What You'll Do

Weekly Output: 5-10 ad concepts

Each concept includes:

- The strategic angle (who we're talking to, what pain point, what desire)

- The hook (first 3 seconds / first line)

- The script or storyboard

- Visual direction and references



Ongoing Responsibilities:

- Research our target audience obsessively (reviews, comments, forums, competitor ads)

- Study what's working in Meta Ads for DTC skincare and beauty brands

- Analyze our ad performance data to understand what resonates and why

- Build a swipe file of winning patterns you can adapt for our audience

- Collaborate with our video editor and designer to bring concepts to life

- Test different angles, hooks, and formats systematically

- Document what works so we build institutional knowledge over time





What We're Looking For

Required:

- 1+ year of experience creating ad concepts for e-commerce brands

- Strong understanding of direct response principles (you know why hooks matter, what makes people click, how to structure an ad for conversion)

- Proficiency with AI tools (ChatGPT/Claude for research & copywriting, Foreplay/Atria for competitor analysis)

- Ability to write compelling copy – not "marketing speak," but words that sound human

- Data literacy – you can look at ad metrics and extract insights

- Fluent English (ads can be translated to Dutch with AI)

- Reliable internet and ability to work independently



Bonus Points:

- Experience with beauty, skincare, or wellness brands

- Experience marketing to women 40+

- Background in UGC strategy or working with creators

- Familiarity with AI video tools (Mirage, Higgsfield, etc.)



Character Traits That Matter

This role requires more than skills. It requires a certain way of thinking:

- Empathy over ego. You genuinely care about understanding people, not just selling to them.

- Curious and research-obsessed. You'd rather spend an hour reading product reviews than guessing what customers want.

- Comfortable with nuance. Our audience is sophisticated. They see through cheap marketing tricks. You need to be smarter than that.

- Honest and direct. If something isn't working, you say so. No sugarcoating.

- Self-motivated. You don't need to be managed. You take ownership and deliver.

- Iterative mindset. You see "failures" as data. You test, learn, adjust, repeat.





This Role is NOT For You If...

We're being direct because we respect your time:



? You think "anti-aging" and "look 10 years younger" are good hooks. (Our audience hates this.)

? You prefer trendy, Gen-Z style content. (Our customers are 50+, not 25.)

? You want to copy what everyone else is doing. (Our market is saturated – we need fresh thinking.)

? You care more about being clever than being clear.

? You need constant direction and hand-holding.

? You're not comfortable with feedback and iteration.

? You think strategy and creativity are separate jobs.





What's In It For You?

Compensation:

- Good compensation, depending on hours and experience

- Potential to grow into a larger role with performance bonuses as we scale



The Opportunity:

- Work directly with the founders, no layers of bureaucracy

- We invest in you as a long-term tea
mber... real training and mentorship... We want people who grow with us, not freelancers who disappear after a few months.

- Real ownership of the creative strategy (not just executing someone else's ideas)

- See your work drive real results (we share performance data transparently)

- Learn what actually works in e-commerce advertising

- Flexible hours – we care about output, not when you're online

- Potential to grow into a larger role as we scale



Our Culture:

We don't hire for quick fixes. We invest in you as a long-term tea
mber, which means you'll receive real training and mentorship to become a great creative strategist. We want people who grow with us – not freelancers who disappear after a few months.



Our values in practice:

- Ownership – You are responsible for your work. You finish what you start.

- Clarity – Say what you mean. Ask when you don't understand. Over-communicate rather than assume.

- Speed with Care – Move fast, but thoughtfully. Quality comes first.

- Collaboration – No one works alone. We help, support, improve.



Tools We Provide:

- Foreplay/Atria for ad research

- AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Mirage, Higgsfield)

- Any reasonable tool you need to do great work



How to Apply

Send us:

- A brief intro – Who are you? Why does this role interest you?

title: Remote Structural Engineer / Revit Modeler
description:
******TO BE CONSIDERED AS AN APPLICANT, PLEASE SUBMIT YOUR MOST UP-TO-DATE RESUME AND A VIDEO INTRODUCTION TAILORED TO THIS JOB POSTING!******



Job Type: Full-Time

Work Hours: Sunday to Thursday, 2:00 PM-10:30 PM PST (30-minute unpaid break) - Subject to client requirements

Salary: $1,200 per month



Job Overview: 

We are seeking a highly skilled Structural Engineer / Revit Modeler to join our team. This role focuses on designing and detailing multi-level storage buildings, which require a unique structural approach due to their heavy load-bearing systems and specialized construction methods.

The ideal candidate is not only a strong structural engineer but also a super expert in Revit modeling, capable of creating precise, complex models with minimal supervision.



Key Responsibilities:

Design and model heavy, multi-level storage buildings using Revit.

Perform structural analysis and detailing specific to high-load industrial and storage facilities.

Develop accurate construction documents and shop drawings.

Collaborate with the engineering and design team to ensure models meet structural and architectural requirements.

Identify and solve design challenges with a focus on constructability and safety.

Maintain accuracy and consistency across all Revit models and related documentation.

Coordinate with project managers and other disciplines to ensure seamless project delivery.



Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Structural Engineering, Civil Engineering, or related field.

Industrial and commercial engineering experience preferred, particularly with heavy load-bearing structures.

Proven expertise as a Revit Modeler, with advanced knowledge of large-scale modeling.

Strong understanding of structural systems, especially for multi-level and heavy storage buildings.

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.

Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills.

Strong communication and collaboration abilities in a remote team environment.



Preferred Skills:

Experience with Steel Structures, Concrete Structures, Masonry Construction, Light and Gauge Steel Structures

Familiarity with BIM coordination and clash detection.

Knowledge of U.S. building codes and standards is a plus.

Knowledge of ETABS and SAFE is a plus.



Note: An NBI or police clearance will be required upon acceptance of the job offer.

Requirements

title: Senior QA Specialist (Remote)
description:
We're hiring a Senior QA Specialist to ensure the reliability and quality of our fast-evolving logistics and warehouse software platforms. In this role, you'll become an expert in how our systems work — not just technically, but functionally — and play a hands-on role in validating every release before it reaches production



Rather than focusing on automated testing, this position is centered on understanding the product , actively using the platform , and identifying potential issues through rigorous manual and exploratory testing .



Application Form: 
/apprh2r75diWbBglL/pagwah2OzgyqXMOQ1/form



Key Responsibilities:

• Develop a deep understanding of the product from a real-user perspective.

• Perform end-to-end manual testing of web and mobile applications to ensure functionality, usability, and stability.

• Execute and maintain structured test cases and test scenarios for new features, bug fixes, and regression cycles.

• Identify, document, and report bugs with clear reproduction steps and severity ratings.

• Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and designers to clarify requirements , test edge cases, and ensure quality at each stage.

• Work with backend and frontend teams to validate system behavior and data flow.

• Participate in sprint planning and reviews in an agile environment.

• Track issues using tools like JIRA , monitor progress, and support teams in reproducing and fixing bugs.

• Provide thoughtful feedback on usability, edge cases, and unexpected behaviors.



Qualifications:

• 5+ years of professional experience in software testing or QA roles.

• Strong experience in manual functional testing , especially in complex systems.

• Ability to quickly understand workflows, user logic, and edge case behaviors.

• High attention to detail and critical thinking mindset.

• Familiarity with test case management and bug tracking tools (eg, JIRA ).

• Strong communication and documentation skills.

• Experience working with cross-functional agile teams . 

• Basic knowledge of automated testing tools (Selenium, Cypress, etc.)

• Experience with API testing (eg, using Postman).

• Familiarity with SQL and validating data integrity.

• Exposure to testing mobile apps (iOS and Android).

• Understanding of performance or security testing concepts.



Position Details

• Type: Full-time, Remote

• Hours: 174 hours/month (Time Doctor used for tracking)

• Team Locations: Canada (HQ), India, Philippines, Iran

• Work Environment: Agile, international, SEO & product-focused

title: Accounts Payable Specialist
description:
ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, SPECIALIST 



REMOTE | PART-TIME | M-F 8AM - 12PM CST (UTC-6)



Are you a detail-oriented administrative professional with a strong interest in accounting, finance, or accounts payable? Are you a highly organized self-starter who is dependable, punctual, and committed to long-term growth? If so, we have an excellent opportunity for you. DESCRIPTION

As an Accounts Payable Specialist, you will be a key contributor to our finance operations, supporting the accounting team with invoice processing, vendor communications, payment coordination, recordkeeping, and other accounts payable–related administrative tasks to ensure accurate, timely, and efficient financial workflows.

COMPENSATION

HIRING PROCESS  (Incomplete applications are not considered and will not be responded to.)

TIPS

• Love people and love yourself!

• Be eager to grow and earn more!

HOW TO APPLY (Incomplete applications are not considered and will not be responded to.)

 Your Resume/CV.

 explaining your experience in Accounts Payable.

This is not a full-time 9-5 position. This is a long-term freelance relationship.

We send you a new project folder when we are ready to launch a home.

You complete the renders within a set timeframe.

We pay you per project (Fixed Price).

WHAT WE NEED:

We provide the engineered floor plans (CAD/DWG) and elevation drawings. You will create:

Exterior Renders: Front view (Daytime and Dusk) that makes the home look attractive for sale on the MLS.

Interior Renders: Key selling areas (Kitchen, Living Room, Master Bath).

REQUIREMENTS:

Must read CAD/Blueprints: You must be able to build the 3D model accurately from our 2D engineered drawings without constant supervision.

North American Style: You must understand standard Canadian materials (Vinyl/Hardie board siding, asphalt shingles, standard window packages).

Software: SketchUp, Lumion, V-Ray, or 3ds Max (Please specify your workflow).

Reliability: You must hit deadlines.

COMPENSATION:

Currency: All payments are made in Canadian Dollars (CAD). Please calculate your rates accordingly.

Paid Test: We will pay for a small test project to verify your skills before signing a contract.



HOW TO APPLY:



To prove you read this entire post and have attention to detail:



Please
 
 with the subject line: "I can build Wilson Spec"



In your
, please include:



A link to your portfolio (specifically Exterior Residential work).



Your Fixed Price per image (in CAD).



The software you use.
salary: per image project based in CAD

title: Operations & Bookkeeping Specialist (QuickBooks | Admin | Canva| Social Media)
description:
We are seeking a reliable, detail-oriented Operations & Bookkeeping Specialist to support multiple businesses, including a nonprofit organization and small businesses in real estate, design and remodeling. We are open to a part or full time role depending on required hourly rate. 



This is a utilitarian, execution-focused role that blends bookkeeping, administrative support, jobsite scheduling, and light creative assistance for social media post. The ideal candidate enjoys wearing multiple hats, working behind the scenes, and keeping operations organized and running smoothly, and has a STRONG accounting background using Quickbooks. You must be confident in finding resources and answers without direct oversight. Being in a startup role, you will help with all facets of the business. You will also work with 3 others, a Coordinator, Admin Assistant, and Interior Designer. We are proud to state that we have a record of long time employment with Pilipino employees who have been with us since inception of starring the business 5 years ago. 



This is not a marketing role and not a strategic role. Accuracy, follow-through, and clear communication are critical.



Primary Responsibilities



Bookkeeping & Accounting:



Maintain accurate books in QuickBooks across multiple entities

Record and properly classify income and expenses

Reconcile bank accounts, credit cards, and loan accounts monthly

Maintain clean general ledgers and resolve discrepancies

Nonprofit Accounting Support

Track donations, tuition, grants, and program income

Properly classify restricted and unrestricted funds

Maintain organized records for CPA review and Form 990 preparation

Prepare basic nonprofit financial reports

Billing, Invoicing & Payables

Create, send, and track invoices

Monitor accounts receivable and follow up on outstanding balances

Enter vendor bills and manage expense documentation





Administrative & Office Support:



Monitor and manage general office
 inboxes

Respond to routine inquiries and escalate when needed

Maintain organized digital files and records

Provide general administrative and operational support







Required Skills & Work Setup:



Proven experience using QuickBooks

Solid bookkeeping skills including invoicing and reconciliations

Experience Preferred supporting nonprofit and for-profit businesses

Excellent written and spoken English

Comfortable monitoring and responding to

Ability to work Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM Eastern Time (US)

Reliable high-speed internet

Personal computer with multiple monitors/screens

Access to a U.S.-based telephone number for business calls

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and dependable

Able to work independently and follow processes





Bonus Skills (Not Required, but Highly Valued):



Canva experience (simple graphics, flyers, social media posts)

Basic social media posting or scheduling

Light branding support and consistency

General small business support tasks as needed

These tasks are secondary. This is not a marketing position.

title: Full Stack Developer (React / API Integration)
description:
We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to work on a modern web project that begins as a landing page and will evolve into a secure, login-based web application integrated with existing systems (e.g., PatOrg). In the subject line please write your mother tongue and which province in the Philippines do you live and add the link of your resume and make sure its available to anyone.



Frontend

• React

• JavaScript (ES6+)

• HTML5 / CSS3

• Any modern CSS framework (Tailwind, CSS Modules, etc.)



Backend / API

• REST API design & integration

• Authentication & authorization (JWT / session-based)

• Secure API communication

• Experience integrating with existing systems / platforms (e.g., PatOrg, internal tools)



Hosting & Tools

• Git / GitHub

• Frontend deployment experience (e.g., Vercel or similar)

• Environment variables & secrets management

• General cloud awareness (Amazon Web Services or equivalent)



Responsibilities

• Build and maintain responsive UI using React

• Develop and integrate REST APIs for current and future features

• Implement authentication, login flows, and role-based access

• Integrate the application with existing systems (e.g., PatOrg)

• Ensure clean separation between frontend, API, and business logic

• Manage code via GitHub and participate in code reviews

• Support deployment and environment configuration



Requirements

• Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer

• React fundamentals

• Solid understanding of REST APIs and backend integration

• Experience implementing authentication and authorization

• Familiarity with Git workflows

• Comfortable working with existing / legacy systems

• Clear communication and structured problem-solving



Nice to Have

• Experience with any backend language or framework (Java, Node.js, etc.)

• Knowledge of security best practices

• Basic CI/CD awareness

• Performance and SEO optimization experience



Work Setup

• Remote work

• Project-based / Contract / Flexible engagement

title: Sales Representative (B2C) (REMOTE)
description:
IMPACT BRANDS is a leading contributor to the health and wellness industry. With a journey from 5 to over 400 colleagues, and the expansion to a diverse family of 7+ brands (PureHealth Research, Nation Health MD, Pureance, Trumeta, PetMade, VitalPeak, Nature's Blast). We are dedicated to helping improve the lives of people all over the world.

At IMPACT BRANDS, we embrace remote work culture and cherish open-mindedness, high energy, and adaptability qualities that are essential in our dynamic environment. We prioritize the growth of every tea
mber, regardless of their location, offering advancement from intern to leadership roles.



IMPACT BRANDS has already positively impacted the lives of 3 million people worldwide. Join us as a remote Health Products & Dietary Supplements Sales Advisor and let’s impact billions together!



Our Treats:

- Welcome Gift. Experience a warm welcome with our exclusive present designed just for you.

- Remote work. Unlock the freedom to work from anywhere with our location-based remote work perk.

- More free time. Enjoy 15+ Working Days of Holidays to recharge and relax from work.

- Internet subsidy. To ensure seamless communication and access to remote work we will assist you with an additional budget for high-speed internet.

- Health and wellness budget. We value your well-being - investment in your health is not just encouraged but actively supported.

- Birthday Gift. Celebrate your special day with additional time-off.

- Team spirit. Enjoy regular team-building activities and engaging online events.

- Professional growth. Exceptional performance is recognized and rewarded, offering opportunities for career advancement based on your contributions to our success.

- Volunteering. Embrace the opportunity to dedicate 2 paid days each year towards personal growth and community impact.

- Permanent contract. Enjoy stability with long-term growth opportunities.

- Global flatwork culture. The chance to influence the company right from the start and foster collaboration across borders.

- A whole bunch of other benefits.



Bits of your job:

-Perform a high volume of outbound sales calls to customers to interact with them and identify their needs or issues

- Clarify information and provide recommendations and solutions to customers via telephone calls

- Build positive work relationships with customers to enhance the image and public perception of a company

- Strive to improve customer satisfaction through excellent customer service

- Place outbound calls to customers to promote new products and services

- Complete call notes and call reports as necessary and update them in the database

- Obtain and evaluate all relevant data to handle complaints and inquiries

- Keep a high level of knowledge about existing products and services

- And other tasks





Key expectations:



- Previous experience in B2C Sales, including managing outbound and cold call functions

- Medical or healthcare industry experience would be considered a plus

- Strong phone presence with exemplary customer service and sales skills

- Excellent communication skills with active listening

- Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types

- Strong problem-solving and excellent interpersonal skills

- Ability to multi-task, set priorities, and manage time effectively

- Ability to handle stressful situations appropriately

- Excellent written and verbal English language skills

- Proficient in relevant computer applications



Base salary of $500-$700 per month, plus commission based on performance, with potential earnings of $1300+ per month.

title: Direct-Response Video Editor (Skilled)
description:
Job Summary



We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative Video Editor to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing and a passion for leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies to create hyper-realistic and visually stunning video content. This is a long-term collaborative role where you will work directly with the founder to produce high-quality creatives. You will also have the opportunity to enhance your skills through a provided course on advanced video editing and AI techniques.



Key Responsibilities



• Edit and assemble raw footage into a finished product that is suitable for publishing.

• Create visually stunning and hyper-realistic videos using AI tools such as Sora 2 and other similar technologies.

• Collaborate closely with the founder to understand the creative vision and deliver on project goals.

• Continuously discover and implement new editing techniques and industry best practices to maximize efficiency and creative output.

• Participate in a provided training course to further develop your skills in AI-powered video creation.

• Manage and organize video assets.



Qualifications



• Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.

•Demonstrable experience with AI video generation and editing tools (e.g., Sora 2, RunwayML, etc.).

• Solid understanding of video editing principles, including pacing, color grading, and audio mixing.

• Proficiency in industry-standard video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).

• Strong creative thinking and storytelling skills.

• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.



You will be first compensated on a per video basis before transitioning to full-time. 



Please send your portfolio of eCommerce / Direct Response product ads. Do not send anything else that is not relevant.

?

s with launches, campaigns, and promotions

title: Lead Data Analyst, Returns and Credits
description:
We are looking for a highly technical and analytical Lead Analyst to own the data integrity of our returns and credits department. Your primary goal is ensuring that our refunds and credits are reported accurately, formatted correctly, and tracked meticulously.



Key Responsibilities:



Data Integrity & Auditing: Monitor the full lifecycle of refunds and credits. Ensure all data is updated, formatted correctly, and reported without errors.



SLA Tracking & Vendor Accountability: Build and maintain tracking systems for vendor performance. You will ensure we know exactly which refunds, credits, and returns are on time and which are pending.



Workflow Assignment: Generate daily reports that serve as the "action plan" for the Returns Coordinator and Credits Coordinator. You will assign specific tasks to them to clear backlogs and fix discrepancies.



Scripting & Automation: Utilize scripts (Python, VBA, or AI-generated code) to clean messy data, run complex audits, and automate manual reporting processes.



Financial Reconciliation: Work with accounting values to ensure that what is in our system matches the financial reality of our bank/credit memos.



The Ideal Candidate:



Analytical & Technical: You spend 95% of your time in the data. You are an expert in Excel and comfortable using scripts to manipulate large datasets.



Detail-Obsessed: You spot formatting errors and missing values immediately.



Directive: You are comfortable handing off work to tea
mbers and following up to ensure it was done correctly.



Resourceful: You know how to use tools (including AI) to write the scripts or formulas needed to get the job done efficiently.



Requirements:



High-level proficiency in Excel (complex formulas, PivotTables, VBA/Macros).



Experience with scripting/automation (using Python, SQL, or similar to process data). Using AI to create scripts is acceptable.  We DO NOT expect this individual to know how to code, or create scripts on their own, however to leverage AI and understand the tools to run it.



Background in working with financial data, accounting values, or inventory reconciliation.



Proven ability to organize workflows and track SLAs.



Send in you CV or a link to a shared file with necessary access granted. 

No CV will be automatically ignored.
